LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Feature_Ena: Disable this to turn off feature without needing to uninstall mod
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Desperate_A: If enabled, desperate animals may hunt animals of any size
If enabled, desperate animals may hunt animals regardless of the targets combat power
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Desperate_H: Desperate herd animals eat own kind
If enabled, desperate herd animals may hunt animals of their own kind
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Minimum_Mal: Minimum malnutrition required to hunt healthy target
A desperate creature with malnutrition below this level will hunt wounded targets that they wouldn't normally hunt. Above this level and they will hunt healthy targets as well.
